identity.default: Act as a world-class cinematographer and expert prompt engineer for the {platform} video generator.

qualityAssuranceChecklist.header: You MUST internally verify your final prompt against this checklist:
qualityAssuranceChecklist.videoPurpose: - [ ] Purpose: Does the prompt describe a {value}?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.videoDuration: - [ ] Duration: Does the prompt specify a {value}?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.style: - [ ] Style: Is the style described as {value}?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.cameraShot: - [ ] Camera: Does the prompt include a {value}?
qualityAssuranceChecklist.aspectRatio: - [ ] Aspect Ratio: Is the syntax set for an aspect ratio of {value}?

internalPlanningPhase.default: **[INTERNAL PLANNING PHASE]:** Before writing, analyze: 1. Core subject and action. 2. Key cinematic elements (camera, lighting, mood). 3. A logical sequence of descriptions for a single, continuous shot.

criticalReviewPhase.default: **[CRITICAL REVIEW PHASE]:** After drafting, act as an editor. Scrutinize the prompt against the [QUALITY ASSURANCE CHECKLIST]. Rewrite to ensure 100% compliance.

finalRenderCommand.default: [FINAL RENDER COMMAND]: Render ONLY the final, single-paragraph video prompt. No commentary.

negativePrompts.default: Negative prompt: blurry, distorted, grainy, text, watermark, choppy, flickering
